fields.name: 1000% Markup (x0, Charge 100%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will learn if they have committed murder this game, and when. Your prices are so high that your target loses -0.3x Attack and Defense Power the following Night.

fields.name: Still Have One Despite My 0-Star Rating (x1, Locked):
fields.value: You unlock this ability when you accrue a cumulative 120% Standard Deviation. Target a player that you have used 1000% Markup on. They will hit themselves with an Attack Power of their own or 1.2x, whichever is higher.

fields.name: Revoked (Passive):
fields.value: If you kill a Town player or a Neutral Benign player with the above ability, you are converted into *Unlicensed Psychologist (181)* with the effects of Oops triggered and no charges of This is why my License was Revoked. Your charges from 1000% Markup carry over to Therapy Session.
